review: Once it was hooked up it is great. You should have better directions inside to hoop it up.  I could not open the remote to insert the batteries. I googled that and got results. Many people had the same problem I had.  Then, when it was hooked up, it would not work. I did not know how to select nor to go up and down. Since it is completely black I suggest putting white arrows around the select button so you can see the direction arrows. I found out quite by accident. then, I thought I was all set and what do you know it did not work. I then googled that problem and I found out I needed a newer and faster router.  After I bought that, it finally worked and works great. My husband watches a lot of  tv since he is in a wheelchair. He now can find movies all the time.
